name: Kembang Kantil
description:
for women of dusk, bloody soil,
ripped heart, torn clothes,
empty street, abandoned bridge,
failed birth, house ruin,
fractured trees, uneasy night


[Kembang Kantil is a flower that has been associated with magic and a famous female ghost called Kuntilanak, a ghost whose death was caused by childbirth. However in some other tales, she was actually the victim of sexual abuse. This art comes from a chatter in our house that if Kuntilanak is really exist, she must be our ally. As the flower is demonized, it becomes our house symbol of demonized human: those who are non-conforming and continuously finding a way to take back their power and freedom].

- 4000x6000
- 300 DPI
- Digital painting
